description: A glossy magazine all about handguns and shooting.  There is a good article about proper sighting near the middle.

variants.description: A glossy magazine all about handguns and shooting.  There is a good article about proper sighting near the middle.
Simple beginner's guide to shooting handguns safely and effectively; simple and effective rules with some key information about handguns themselves.

name.str: The Practical Guide to Guns and Shooting, Handgun Edition
name.str_pl: copies of The Practical Guide to Guns and Shooting, Handgun Edition

variants.description: A practical guide for one who want to buy a gun - how they differ, how to choose the right ammo, shooting techniques, and lot of another info.

name.str: Defensive Handgun for the Armed Citizen
name.str_pl: copies of Defensive Handgun for the Armed Citizen

variants.description: This book takes carrying handguns seriously, and delivers lots of information a user may need to know, including self defense concepts, using deadly force, analyzing confrontation, as well as handgun tactics and techniques.

name.str: The Gun Digest Book of the Revolver
name.str_pl: copies of The Gun Digest Book of the Revolver

variants.description: This book covers all aspects of the double-action revolver: shooting, handling, carrying, maintaining, and accessorizing - everything you need to know to operate the quintessential American handgun.
A shiny magazine about handguns and activities around them - handgun hunting, competition shooting, reloading, new brands and gear, ammo, and other similar things.

name.str_pl: copies of The Tao of the Handgun

description: This introspective volume covers proper usage of handguns, from safety and stance, to maintenance and proper sighting technique.

name.str_pl: copies of The Tao of the Handgun

variants.description: This introspective volume covers proper usage of handguns, from safety and stance, to maintenance and proper sighting technique.

name.str: Practical Guide to the Operational Use of the TT-33 Tokarev Pistol
name.str_pl: copies of Practical Guide to the Operational Use of the TT-33 Tokarev Pistol

variants.description: The most current, up to date, full color manual anywhere on the TT-33 Tokarev pistol, from former Special Forces instructor.  Surprisingly easy to follow.

name.str: Gun Safety: For Home Defense And Concealed Carry
name.str_pl: copies of Gun Safety: For Home Defense And Concealed Carry

variants.description: A book for a responsible gun owner, it highlights using weapons in the civil world, with lot of rules and legal recommendations, alongside  how to avoid harm for the gun user and their environment.

name.str: Pistols & Revolvers: From 1400 to the Present Day
name.str_pl: copies of Pistols & Revolvers: From 1400 to the Present Day

variants.description: The book contains a long, detailed history of handguns - from the very first hand cannons to the latest automatics and machine pistols, with photos, technical specifications, and some artwork.
A complete guide to maintaining handguns - lots of information about components, reloading, bullet types, and ballistics.

name.str: Gun Digest Book of Automatic Pistols Assembly/Disassembly
name.str_pl: copies of Gun Digest Book of Automatic Pistols Assembly/Disassembly

variants.description: A giant, 1000-page manual of with step-by-step instructions for the disassembly of automatic pistols.  Over 100 models are covered, with clear photos and procedure tips.

name.str_pl: copies of Book of Revolvers Assembly/Disassembly

variants.description: A 700-page instructional manual of different revolver disassembly processes, with photos, detailed steps, and additional info.

name.str: FM 3-23.35: Combat Training With Pistols, M9 And M11
name.str_pl: copies of FM 3-23.35: Combat Training With Pistols, M9 And M11

variants.description: Official U.S. Army manual detailing how M9 and M11 handguns work, and how to use them safely and effectively.

name.str_pl: copies of Black Powder to Berettas

variants.description: This hardcover book, aimed at the gun nut, provides an illustrated, concise history of the handgun throughout history, including technical specifications and use techniques.  It's difficult to follow without a passing knowledge in pistols, but an experienced handgun user could glean much from it.
